comment._content: Pauline Chase (1885-1962), American stage actress based in England, played Peter Pan in London (1906-1913), and was close to JM Barrie: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pauline_Chase

comment._content: Nice view and model. Thanks and greetings.
